name: Red Johnson's Chronicles
description:
Metropolis, capital of crime. Agent Robert of the Police Department asks Red Johnson to lead the investigation into the shots heard from Drownedman's Bridge. There are very few witnesses and they are not very forthcoming. As usual, the police are incompetent. But there are enough clues to put Red Johnson on the trail of a dangerous fugitive who escaped from the high-security wing of Metropolis Jail the day before. The hunt is on...
Play private detective Red Johnson in this unique adventure game with stunning backdrops. Explore strange worlds, find and use clues to solve the many mysteries that will lead you to the truth. Question suspects and confront them in breathtaking action scenes that will have you on the edge of your seat.
